description:
A sandtrap and toggle are sufficient anchor equipment.

Approach

Descent

The first rappel as a downclimb is R at the worst, not X as rated elsewhere. Some have apparently added a second rappel immediately following the first, bringing the total up to four. Please don't leave your webbing here; a simple/safe partner assist works well.

Done as a single rappel, the second (or third) drop is difficult to clean and will scar the rock. I recommend a third rappel from the next pothole ledge.

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

  • CanyonCollective.com  : The Snakelet

name: The Snakelet
